_.name: JeroenVermeulen_Solarium
_.summary: Solr based full text search for Magento CE. Uses the Solarium library.
_.description:
Solr based full text search for Magento CE. Has an option to enable auto correct of search terms. Uses the Solarium library.
* After installing this extension: * Clear the *Configuration* cache * Log out of the Admin * Log in on the Admin again * Configure and enable it via: *System > Configuration > CATALOG > Solarium Search* * Reindex the *Catalog Search Index*, this will update Solr (if enabled)
GitHub repo: https://github.com/jeroenvermeulen/magento-solarium
Report bugs: https://github.com/jeroenvermeulen/magento-solarium/issues
_.notes:
Beta version. Do not use on a production shop right away.
* Fix for issue #1: Solr xml illegal character issue on Magento indexing * Added auto correct for search terms * Improved error catching * Added configurable timeout * Added confirmation after rebuilding Solr index * Symfony EventDispatcher version: 2.4.2 * Improved error catching * Removed some unnecessary settings from solrconfig.xml
Your solrconfig.xml must be configured to support spellcheck on the /select handler. An example solrconfig.xml is included: app/code/community/JeroenVermeulen/Solarium/docs/solrconfig.xml
